title: The Affliction of Memory
creator_credit: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: For Zeina Zogheib the aroma of coffee and the fragrant scent of gardenia bring memories of Lebanon flooding back. A place Zeina and her family fled, due to the ravages of war.
creator_credit_for_label: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
